reviewText: Kaoru reveals that he is a she and she is in love with Kouji. Kouji asks why the deskies, Kaoru says that her mother Sumie told her to do it before they moved into the house. Sumie was trying to save Kaoru from Kouji's father. with a fire that destroys the storage building with Kouji's father inside, Sumie's fears are gone. Kaoru decides to say with Kouji who is still have a relationship with Mitsuko and Sumie.
It good I like it. It look like he got all the women folks. Did he married the girl? I wish it had english dub!

This is the final volume in the Mistreared Bride Saga. In this last chapter you find out our Bride is in lust with her Brother - Law. The brother - Law finds out that his little brother is really his little sister! That his mother has been mistreated by his fater and that is the reason he never knew that his little brother was in fact his little sister. It was keep secrect so that the father wouldn't get his hands on her. Needless to say the evil father dies a tragic death, the brother saves his littel sister and mother. In the end he is rewarded for his heroisum by all the women. This is a must have as Japananime once again puts out a classic in hentaiMistreated Bride Vol. 4 Purchase through Amazon
